'''''Lycoperdon pulcherrimum''''' is a type of [[puffball]] mushroom in the genus ''[[Lycoperdon]]''. It was first [[species description|described]] scientifically in 1873 by [[Miles Joseph Berkeley]] and [[Moses Ashley Curtis]].<ref name="Berkeley 1873"/> The fungus is found in the southern United States.<ref name="Miller 2006"/>
